Notes.Text:
This update for openldap2 fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2017-17740: When both the nops module and the memberof overlay
  are enabled, attempts to free a buffer that was allocated on the stack,
  which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (slapd crash)
  via a member MODDN operation.  (bsc#1073313)

Vulnerabilities.Description: contrib/slapd-modules/nops/nops.c in OpenLDAP through 2.4.45, when both the nops module and the memberof overlay are enabled, attempts to free a buffer that was allocated on the stack, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (slapd crash) via a member MODDN operation.
